message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about $11,000? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
